result.heading: AND THIS IS WHEN WE GO INTO SLOW MOTION -- FROM HERE UNTIL THE END

direction.raw_text: wanting to go. Joe knows what this means. He looks up at his father, who also understand. AND THIS IS WHEN WE GO INTO SLOW MOTION -- FROM HERE UNTIL THE END. After a long beat, Joe HOLDS THE NECKLACE UP, toward the tower -- the thing PULLING... TEARS in Joe's eyes as he looks up at it -- not wanting to let go, but knowing he must. Jack, heartsick, watches his son, on the verge of letting go. Alice watches Joe, on the verge of tears

result.heading: LOCKET PULLS TOWARD THE WATER TOWER --
OUR SCORE SOARS AS, IN SLOW MOTION,
SHOOTS ACROSS THE MAIN STREET UP TO THE WATER TOWER

direction.raw_text: except Joe just can't bring himself to do it, not now, not ever. But then something happens. Pulled by the invisible force, THE LOCKET POPS OPEN. And we see what's inside. A PHOTOGRAPH of Joe's MOTHER. A young woman, HOLDING HER ONE SMALL BABY. And Joe looks at his mother -- and in this moment, she at him and Jack's eyes suddenly WELL WITH TEARS -- Alice, too, tears streaming down her face and finally Jack reaches out -- and puts his hand on his son's shoulder -- which was all Joe needed, really. And finally... after all... JOE LETS GO. OUR SCORE SOARS AS, IN SLOW MOTION, the necklace SHOOTS ACROSS THE MAIN STREET UP TO THE WATER TOWER!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: CREATURE, LEAVING -- CLIMBING UP THE WATER TOWER AND ENTERS HIS SHIP -- AND IT BEGINS TO LIFT
AS IT TAKES OFF, THE WEIGHT OF THE TOWER IS TOO MUCH

direction.raw_text: and that's when Joe sees the CREATURE, LEAVING -- CLIMBING UP THE WATER TOWER AND ENTERS HIS SHIP -- AND IT BEGINS TO LIFT. AS IT TAKES OFF, THE WEIGHT OF THE TOWER IS TOO MUCH: IT COLLAPSES INTO MAIN STREET.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: AND WHEN IT HITS, THE ENTIRE TOWER IMPLODES FROM PRESSURE -- A FIREWORKS-LIKE EXPLOSION OF WATER BURSTS AND SHOWERS THE STREET AS THE MAJESTIC SHIP COMPLETES ITS FORMATION --
